description: Kaede Fuyou is Rin`s childhood friend who grew up with him in the same house after her mother and Rin`s parents died in a car accident. Some time after they started junior high school, Kaede started taking care of Rin. She can also be down to earth, psychotic and even mentally crazy when she sees Rin with another girl. Kaede is easily embarrassed and is happy in her role as homemaker.
name: Fuyou Kaede
